subtitle.Text: So, I’m Sarah Argodale, this is my salad dressing
named for my experience with being in Russia
and that being for what everyone knows me for.
I studied Russian in college and I lived there for about a year teaching English
when I finished school and it’s, it was a cool thing that happened in my life.
Oh! So, I am a reader of the Idle Thumbs podcast and I guess that’s how I met everyone at The Fullbright Company
and kind of inserted myself into their lives.
The Gone Home team, the Fullbright team, was nice enough to put a little token in the game for me, and it’s pretty cool.
